Struthio camelus Linnaeus, 1758
Struthio molybdophanes Reichenow, 1883
Rhea americana (Linnaeus, 1758)
Rhea pennata d'Orbigny, 1837
Apteryx australis Shaw, 1813
Apteryx mantelli A. D. Bartlett, 1852
Apteryx rowi Tennyson, Palma, H. A. Robertson, Worthy & B. J. Gill, 2003
Apteryx owenii Gould, 1847
Apteryx haastii Potts, 1872
